message.subject: Time Off Request
message.text: Hello Alice, ~~I am writing to request to take the day off next Friday. My son will be performing in his school play and my husband and I want to be there to support him.~~Best, Jane

message.subject: When is meeting?
message.text: What time is the department meeting today?~~-John

message.subject: RE: When is meeting?
message.text: The meeting is at 3, don't be late~~Best,~Alice

message.subject: Need yuor asisstanc
message.text: Hello sir,~I am prinxe of nigeria and i need your help to move 12 million of Diamonds to Amerrica. There willl be of no risk to you or yuor family and return i pay you 2.4 million dollor. pleaze repond soon~~~~prinze ibbrahim

message.subject: Congratulations!
message.text: Congratulations!~~You have won our jackpot drawing of 1 MILLION DOLLARS!~~In order to claim your prize, please provide your name, address, and bank account number so we can promptly deliver your winnings~~AAA Lottery Group

message.subject: Ticket Complete
message.text: Your support ticket #8166548: Password reset has been marked complete.~~If your problem has not been resolved to your satisfaction, please reopen your ticket. Otherwise, you do not need to respond~~B Company IT Department
